scripts.start: zsh <(echo -n '$(if (( $+commands[doas] )) then echo -n doas; elif (( $+commands[sudo] )) then echo -n sudo; fi) systemctl start mariadb.service && ./bin/app')
scripts.test: curl http://localhost:8000 &>/dev/null; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo -ne '\e[1;91;mThe server doesn''t appear to up and running locally at port 8000'; fi
